original_text: As its head, he helps the whole body to grow well. Each part joins with the other parts so that the whole body becomes strong. As each separate part does its proper work, we love each other more and more.
korean_text: 그에게서 온 몸이 각 마디를 통하여 도움을 받음으로 연결되고 결합되어 각 지체의 분량대로 역사하여 그 몸을 자라게 하며 사랑 안에서 스스로 세우느니라

sentences.original_text: As its head, he helps the whole body to grow well.
sentences.korean_translation: 머리로서 그는 온몸이 잘 자라도록 돕습니다.

sentences.original_text: Each part joins with the other parts
so that the whole body becomes strong.
As each separate part does its proper work,
sentences.korean_translation: 각 부분이 제 역할을 할 때,

sentences.original_text: we love each other more and more.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 서로를 점점 더 사랑하게 됩니다.
